Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled performance in its category. We believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its quality and unique features, we're offering it to you for $20000. We're confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Let's discuss how we can make this opportunity work for both of us. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $20,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $20,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
